ValidationRule.description: MP4 Link is required to change status to "Product Delivered" when product group is "Webinar" or "Roundtable"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.Id = "0125Y000001bPG9" && OR( ISBLANK(Completion_Date__c), Completion_Date__c >= DATEVALUE( "2022-01-01" ) ) && ( Product_Group__c = "Webinar" || Product_Group__c = "Roundtable" ) && (Project_Status_Display__c = "Product Delivered") && ISBLANK(MP4_Link__c)
